text: Mylostynya pryznachena dlya nuzhdennykh i bidnykh, tykh, khto yiyi zbyraye ta rozdaye, tykh, vid chyyikh serdetsʹ chekayutʹ prykhylʹnosti, [dlya vykupu] rabiv, dlya zbankrutilykh borzhnykiv, dlya tykh, khto [boretʹsya] na shlyakhu Allaha, a takozh dlya podorozhnikh. Tak vstanovleno Allahom. A Allah — Vseznayuchyy, Mudryy
